item.title: Surrounded Regions
item.description: LeetCode 130. Surrounded Regions Given a 2D board containing ‘X’ and ‘O’ (the letter O), capture all regions surrounded by ‘X’. A region is captured by flipping all ‘O’s into ‘X’s in that surrounded region. For example, 1 2 3 4 X X X X X O O X X X O X X O X X
